title: Fixes a crash when Bluetooth is disabled.
message: Fixes a crash when Bluetooth is disabled.

title: Improvements for the volume restore logic.
message: Improvements for the volume restore logic.

title: Fixes #2
message:
Fixes #2

Added a setting for resetting the media volume after a device disconnects.

title: Fixes padding on items in the device list.
message: Fixes padding on items in the device list.

title: Fixes #1
message:
Fixes #1

Added a preference screen allowing users to show or hide the volume indicator.

title: Updated Gradle Plugin and improve functionality without music playing.
message:
Updated Gradle Plugin and improve functionality without music playing.

Gradle Plugin is now updated to the new version to support the new Android Studio features introduced in 2.1

When no music player is running or auto-starts when a Bluetooth device is connected, a custom (silent) track will be played to ensure the volume can be changed properly.
